content: single_crochet sctog the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * to * 18 single_crochet r 22 - single_crochet in the next 4sc decrease the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 15sc stuff the football r 23 - single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet 2 decrease the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 12sc r 24 - single_crochet in the next 2sc *decrease the next 2 single_crochet *repeat around finish stuffing the ball if needed 6 tie off leaving a 8 inch tail of yarn to weave in the ends with needle and c2 stitch the laces on the side of the football 7
